mapper.select: SELECT EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ AS reservPenaltySeq /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.PENALTY_APPLY_DD AS penaltyApplyDd /* 패널티 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.FEE_RATE AS feeRate /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.FEE_AMT AS feeAmt /* 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY /* 예약 규정 패널티 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ = #{reservPenaltySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY /* 예약 규정 패널티 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ = #{reservPenaltySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ AS reservPenaltySeq /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.PENALTY_APPLY_DD AS penaltyApplyDd /* 패널티 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.FEE_RATE AS feeRate /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.FEE_AMT AS feeAmt /* 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY /* 예약 규정 패널티 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ = #{param.reservPenaltySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{param.reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY.RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY SET /* 예약 규정 패널티 */ RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PENALTY_APPLY_DD = #{penaltyApplyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 패널티 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,FEE_RATE = #{feeRate, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 수수료 율, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,FEE_AMT = #{feeAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ = #{reservPenaltySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_RULE_PENALTY /* 예약 규정 패널티 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_PENALTY_SEQ = #{reservPenaltySeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 패널티 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
